title: Amazing 3 BR, 1.5 Bath in Niles. Extremely Spacious & Prime Location!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   ★ Amazing 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment in Niles ★ Extremely spacious ★ Prime location ★ Fully renovated throughout ★  Amenities included: dishwasher, laundry in building. Utilities included: heat and water. Is pet friendly. Date Available: July 2, 2022. $2,100/month rent. The location is convenient to shopping, restaurants, schools and public transportation, so HURRY!  Owner pays for water. Renter responsible for gas and electric. Pets permitted. One month security deposit due at signing.
